testSteps.action: Send a vehicle identification message to the DoIP server
testSteps.expectedResult: The DoIP server responds with a vehicle identification response message

testcases.description: Check if the TCP connection will be closed when the general inactivity timer will expire

testSteps.action: Establish a connection to the DoIP server
Wait about 90% of the time given by general inactivity timer
Wait about 20% of the time given by general inactivity timer (Which gives us a total time of 110% from the beginning)
